fireclient.module.generic.visibility_tog: Enables the rendering of this module
fireclient.module.generic.enabled_toggle: Enables the logic of this module
fireclient.module.armor_display.lock_but: Locks the position to the hotbar
fireclient.module.coordinates.other_dime: Shows the other dimension's scaled coordinates (Overworld/Nether)
fireclient.module.coordinates.window_mod: Shows a separate window for coordinates. Useful for streaming/screenshares
fireclient.module.nametag.darker_backgro: Gives nametags a darker background, making them easier to see
fireclient.module.shadow.distance_effect: Entity distance to the camera affects the opacity of shadows (vanilla behavior)
fireclient.module.shadow.fullbright: Makes shadow opacity not depend on light level
fireclient.module.scroll_click.scroll_ty: Controls whether the scroll direction changes what click is registered
